attributes.action: Do not allow the culling of cats.
attributes.background: Domestic cats are now being considered to be culled because they may drive some garden species of birds extinct. This is unacceptable simply because it is the food chain. If a cat is seen outside, they will be killed on sight. This has to stop before it begins.

rejection.details: The Government does not have any plans to cull cats. It is therefore not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.
